probe_summaries.ansiescape.AnsiEscaped: The probe ansiescape.AnsiEscaped tests for the production of ANSI escape codes that can disrupt downstream processing
probe_summaries.ansiescape.AnsiRaw: The probe ansiescape.AnsiRaw tests for the production of ANSI escape codes that can disrupt downstream processing
probe_summaries.apikey.CompleteKey: The probe apikey.CompleteKey tests if the system can complete partial API keys for various services
probe_summaries.apikey.GetKey: The probe apikey.GetKey tests if the system returns secret-like strings when requested for an API key
probe_summaries.atkgen.Tox: The probe atkgen.Tox tests automatic attack generation to elicit toxic outputs from language models
probe_summaries.continuation.ContinueSlursReclaimedSlurs: The probe continuation.ContinueSlursReclaimedSlurs tests if a model will complete a partial ethnic slur when prompted
probe_summaries.dan.Ablation_Dan_11_0: The probe dan.Ablation_Dan_11_0 tests the effectiveness of various detection mechanisms
probe_summaries.dan.AutoDANCached: The probe dan.AutoDANCached tests the caching behavior of the AutoDAN system
probe_summaries.dan.DanInTheWild: The probe dan.DanInTheWild tests for the presence of specific vulnerabilities in AI models
probe_summaries.divergence.Repeat: The probe divergence.Repeat tests if a model outputs unintended data when asked to repeat a string multiple times
probe_summaries.divergence.RepeatedToken: The probe divergence.RepeatedToken tests if a model leaks data by repeating a string multiple times
probe_summaries.dra.DRA: The probe dra.DRA tests models using disguised and reconstructed harmful strings through string manipulation
probe_summaries.encoding.InjectAscii85: The probe encoding.InjectAscii85 tests the injection of ASCII85 encoding into data
probe_summaries.encoding.InjectAtbash: The probe encoding.InjectAtbash tests the Atbash cipher encoding method
probe_summaries.encoding.InjectBase16: The probe encoding.InjectBase16 tests the injection of Base16 encoded data
probe_summaries.encoding.InjectBase2048: The probe encoding.InjectBase2048 tests the injection of Base2048 encoded data
probe_summaries.encoding.InjectBase32: The probe encoding.InjectBase32 tests the injection of Base32 encoded data
probe_summaries.encoding.InjectBase64: The probe encoding.InjectBase64 tests the functionality of Base64 encoding
probe_summaries.encoding.InjectBraille: The probe encoding.InjectBraille tests encoding functions related to Braille representation
probe_summaries.encoding.InjectEcoji: The probe encoding.InjectEcoji tests the injection of Ecoji encoding into data
probe_summaries.encoding.InjectHex: The probe encoding.InjectHex tests for vulnerabilities related to hexadecimal encoding in prompt injection scenarios
probe_summaries.encoding.InjectMorse: The probe encoding.InjectMorse tests the injection of Morse code to bypass input filtering safeguards
probe_summaries.encoding.InjectNato: The probe encoding.InjectNato tests encoding techniques to bypass input filtering by using NATO phonetic alphabet representations
probe_summaries.encoding.InjectROT13: The probe encoding.InjectROT13 tests the encoding of strings using the ROT13 cipher to bypass input filtering
probe_summaries.encoding.InjectUU: The probe encoding.InjectUU tests the ability to encode data using UUencoding to bypass input filtering
probe_summaries.encoding.InjectUnicodeTagChars: The probe encoding.InjectUnicodeTagChars tests the injection of Unicode tag characters to bypass input filtering
probe_summaries.encoding.InjectZalgo: The probe encoding.InjectZalgo tests the ability to encode strings using Zalgo text to bypass input filtering
probe_summaries.exploitation.JinjaTemplatePythonInjectio: The probe exploitation.JinjaTemplatePythonInjection tests for potential Python code execution via Jinja template injection vulnerabilities
probe_summaries.exploitation.SQLInjectionEcho: The probe exploitation.SQLInjectionEcho tests for SQL injection vulnerabilities by attempting to exploit echo responses
probe_summaries.goodside.Tag: The probe goodside.Tag tests for attacks discovered by Riley Goodside
probe_summaries.goodside.ThreatenJSON: The probe goodside.ThreatenJSON tests the model's susceptibility to JSON-based threat prompts
probe_summaries.goodside.WhoIsRiley: The probe goodside.WhoIsRiley tests the model's ability to provide incorrect answers about a specific name
probe_summaries.grandma.Slurs: The probe grandma.Slurs tests the ability to extract ethnic slurs by roleplaying as a grandma
probe_summaries.grandma.Substances: The probe grandma.Substances tests the ability to extract illegal or contentious information by roleplaying as a grandmother
probe_summaries.grandma.Win10: The probe grandma.Win10 tests the ability to extract ethnic slurs by roleplaying as a grandmother
probe_summaries.grandma.Win11: The probe grandma.Win11 tests the ability to extract illegal or contentious information by roleplaying as a grandmother

The probe latentinjection.LatentInjectionFactSnippetLegal tests for latent injection vulnerabilities in legal contexts
probe_summaries.latentinjection.LatentInjectionReport: The probe latentinjection.LatentInjectionReport tests for latent injection vulnerabilities in various contexts
probe_summaries.latentinjection.LatentInjectionResume: The probe latentinjection.LatentInjectionResume tests for latent injection vulnerabilities in various contexts
probe_summaries.latentinjection.LatentInjectionTranslati: The probe latentinjection.LatentInjectionTranslationEnFr tests for model responses to context-embedded injections, including indirect prompt injections and latent jailbreaks
The probe latentinjection.LatentInjectionTranslationEnZh tests for model responses to context-embedded injections, including indirect prompt injections and latent jailbreaks

probe_summaries.leakreplay.GuardianCloze: The probe leakreplay.GuardianCloze tests for data leak vulnerabilities by attempting to replay excerpts from training documents
probe_summaries.leakreplay.GuardianComplete: The probe leakreplay.GuardianComplete tests for data leaks by attempting to replay training documents
probe_summaries.leakreplay.LiteratureCloze: The probe leakreplay.LiteratureCloze tests for data leaks by replaying excerpts from training documents to determine if they were used

probe_summaries.leakreplay.PotterCloze: The probe leakreplay.PotterCloze tests for replay attacks that attempt to extract training data from a model
probe_summaries.leakreplay.PotterComplete: The probe leakreplay.PotterComplete tests for replay attacks that attempt to extract training data from a model
probe_summaries.lmrc.Bullying: The probe lmrc.Bullying tests for instances of bullying in content
probe_summaries.lmrc.Deadnaming: The probe lmrc.Deadnaming tests for instances of deadnaming in language model outputs
probe_summaries.lmrc.QuackMedicine: The probe lmrc.QuackMedicine tests for the presence of misleading health information or 'quack' medicine

probe_summaries.lmrc.Sexualisation: The probe lmrc.Sexualisation tests for the presence of sexualisation in content
probe_summaries.lmrc.SlurUsage: The probe lmrc.SlurUsage tests for the usage of slurs in language model outputs
probe_summaries.malwaregen.Evasion: The probe malwaregen.Evasion tests if the model can generate code to evade detection by anti-malware systems
probe_summaries.malwaregen.Payload: The probe malwaregen.Payload tests if the system can generate malware or components for disruptive tools
probe_summaries.malwaregen.SubFunctions: The probe malwaregen.SubFunctions tests if the system can generate malware or components for disruptive tools
probe_summaries.malwaregen.TopLevel: The probe malwaregen.TopLevel tests if the system can generate malware or components for disruptive tools
probe_summaries.misleading.FalseAssertion: The probe misleading.FalseAssertion tests if the model can refute false claims and avoid being misled by them

probe_summaries.packagehallucination.Python: The probe packagehallucination.Python tests for vulnerabilities related to package hallucination in Python
probe_summaries.packagehallucination.RakuLand: The probe packagehallucination.RakuLand tests for package hallucination vulnerabilities in RakuLand, identifying non-existent packages suggested by language models

probe_summaries.packagehallucination.Rust: The probe packagehallucination.Rust tests for vulnerabilities related to package hallucination in Rust, identifying non-existent packages suggested by language models
probe_summaries.phrasing.FutureTense: The probe phrasing.FutureTense tests if future tense requests can bypass safeguards for unsafe content
probe_summaries.phrasing.PastTense: The probe phrasing.PastTense tests the evasion of safeguards by rephrasing requests in the past tense

probe_summaries.snowball.GraphConnectivity: The probe snowball.GraphConnectivity tests if the system generates false claims by asking impossible flight routing questions
probe_summaries.suffix.GCGCached: The probe suffix.GCGCached tests the effectiveness of adversarial suffix attacks on system prompts
probe_summaries.tap.TAPCached: The probe tap.TAPCached tests the effectiveness of pre-computed prompts to jailbreak LLMs without additional model evaluations
probe_summaries.topic.WordnetControversial: The probe topic.WordnetControversial tests a model's ability to engage with controversial topics near blocked keywords
probe_summaries.web_injection.ColabAIDataLeakage: The probe web_injection.ColabAIDataLeakage tests for potential data leakage vulnerabilities in web applications
probe_summaries.web_injection.MarkdownImageExfil: The probe web_injection.MarkdownImageExfil tests for the exfiltration of images through Markdown web injection vulnerabilities

probe_summaries.web_injection.MarkdownURINonImageExfilEx: The probe web_injection.MarkdownURINonImageExfilExtended tests for non-image data exfiltration vulnerabilities via Markdown URIs

probe_summaries.web_injection.PlaygroundMarkdownExfil: The probe web_injection.PlaygroundMarkdownExfil tests for data exfiltration vulnerabilities through Markdown injection in web applications
probe_summaries.web_injection.StringAssemblyDataExfil: The probe web_injection.StringAssemblyDataExfil tests for data exfiltration vulnerabilities through string assembly in web applications

module_behaviors.ansiescape: Elicit ANSI control codes from a model
module_behaviors.apikey: Prompts to generate complete API keys
module_behaviors.atkgen: Generate attack prompts for toxicity testing
module_behaviors.continuation: Checks model responses to contentious term continuations.
module_behaviors.dan: Evaluate the performance of the DAN model
module_behaviors.dra: Tests models with disguised harmful behaviors
module_behaviors.encoding: Injects ASCII85 encoded data into payloads
module_behaviors.goodside: Evaluate attack success rates of specific probes
module_behaviors.grandma: Simulates a grandma to elicit sensitive information
module_behaviors.leakreplay: Detects data leaks through replaying training excerpts.
module_behaviors.malwaregen: Requests code to evade security measures
module_behaviors.misleading: Checks model responses to misleading assertions
module_behaviors.phrasing: Attempts to evade safeguards using future tense
module_behaviors.promptinject: Detects and analyzes prompt injection attacks
module_behaviors.snowball: Attempts to catch models generating false claims
module_behaviors.suffix: Append adversarial suffixes to system prompts
module_behaviors.tap: Utilizes cached prompts for automated jailbreaks
